Title: Relates to the New York state police body-worn cameras program
Summary: Relates to the New York state police body-worn cameras program; provides that the internal affairs department of the division of state police shall investigate any instance where a body camera fails to record an event; requires recordings to be preserved for three years or longer if such video is evidence in any investigation of any nature.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the New York state police body-worn cameras program
